biotools.summary: Package that provides tools for enrichment analysis for Gene Ontology (GO) terms. Different test statistics and different methods for eliminating local similarities and dependencies between GO terms can be implemented and applied.

bioschemas.name: topGO
bioschemas.summary: Package that provides tools for enrichment analysis for Gene Ontology (GO) terms. Different test statistics and different methods for eliminating local similarities and dependencies between GO terms can be implemented and applied.
